parameters: This section may seem a bit redundent but the timing of
spell flash, text result, and sound was important.
The Common event is only called in non-combat situation
so all of the combat spells will be ineffective.
`A torch can only be used in dark places.

be set to the item id. If not it will not add the item

the precious globe hid it in the darkness.'
